member.name: M:ZXing.ImageSharp.BarcodeReader`1.#ctor(ZXing.Reader,System.Func{SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{`0},ZXing.LuminanceSource},System.Func{ZXing.LuminanceSource,ZXing.Binarizer})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the reader which should be used to find and decode the barcode. If null then MultiFormatReader is used
Sets the function to create a luminance source object for a bitmap. If null, an exception is thrown when Decode is called
Sets the function to create a binarizer object for a luminance source. If null then HybridBinarizer is used

member.name: M:ZXing.ImageSharp.BarcodeReader`1.#ctor(ZXing.Reader,System.Func{SixLabors.ImageSharp.Image{`0},ZXing.LuminanceSource},System.Func{ZXing.LuminanceSource,ZXing.Binarizer},System.Func{System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,ZXing.RGBLuminanceSource.BitmapFormat,ZXing.LuminanceSource})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Sets the reader which should be used to find and decode the barcode. If null then MultiFormatReader is used
Sets the function to create a luminance source object for a bitmap. If null, an exception is thrown when Decode is called
Sets the function to create a binarizer object for a luminance source. If null then HybridBinarizer is used
Sets the function to create a luminance source object for a rgb raw byte array.
